General.Name: Guangzhou Tinci Materials Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangzhou Tinci Materials Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, and sale of chemical materials in China. The company offers lithium-ion battery materials, daily chemical materials, and specialty chemicals. It provides daily chemical products, including carbomer, mild surfactant, rheology, sensory modifier, emulsifier, cationic conditioner, suspending stabilizer, natural methyl glucoside derivative, chelating agent, naturally derived preservative, and UV filter, silicone elastomer blend, suspending stabilizer, cationic conditioner, as well as provides makeup and household care products. It also offers lithium-ion battery electrolyte, electrolytes and additives, sodium -ion battery electrolyte, solid electrolyte, and cathode materials products. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Guangzhou, China.
